title: Bug 6410: File marked as dirty by code assist even when unchanged
description: Bug 6410: File marked as dirty by code assist even when unchanged
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made. Additionally, code assist does not appear.
EB: Code assist should only mark the file as dirty if changes have been made. If there are no suggestions from code assist, the file should not be marked as dirty.
SR:
1. Open the file in the IDE.
2. Enable code assist.
3. Inside the file, invoke code assist.
4. Observe if the file is marked as dirty without making any changes.
5. Observe if code assist appears correctly.
